sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_431105_cand_ass_requirement_library"> <x_431105_cand_ass_requirement_library action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category>education_and_training</category> <default_for/> <description>A level of education which corresponds to completed university studies of at least 4 years, attested by a diploma in chemistry, chemical engineering, mineralogy, mining, toxicology, ecotoxicology, biology, environmental studies, human or veterinary medicine, pharmacology, or by a diploma in another subject directly relevant to the nature of the duties.</description> <duration_months>48</duration_months> <number>RQL0001008</number> <short_description>Education in chemicals field [4 years]</short_description> <sys_created_by>nappoma</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-05-18 08:52:50</sys_created_on> <sys_id>12fb4ff2473e6110691e7258946d43f0</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>nappoma</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-05-19 18:30:06</sys_updated_on> </x_431105_cand_ass_requirement_library> </record_update>
